description: The CDI_WORKING_DX table contains information related to working diagnoses for a Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the diagnosis associated with this contact. If the line number is one, the related diagnosis is the principal diagnosis.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_DX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the working diagnosis on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_DX_POA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Present on Admission (POA) value for a working diagnosis on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown


Clinically Undetermined


Exempt from POA reporting

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique ID of the contact that this coding record is associated with.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_DX_CC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The (Major) Complication / Comorbidity status for a working diagnoses in the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


CC


No


MCC
